title: Yo Teach...!
description: Mr. Radford is dropping lessons and turning around the worst class in school.
quote: Either you make this right, or you’ll be spending the Summer teaching Driver’s Ed. Honk! Honk!
altHero: Mark Taylor Jackson as Mr. Radford, a young high school teacher with shaggy hair in a tie and corduroy jacket
alt1: Mr. Radford talks with the principal
alt2: Bo Burnham as a student sitting in class
alt3: Mr. Radford talks with another teacher in the teacher’s lounge
alt4: Leo Koenig in a bright sweatshirt in the teacher’s lounge
